nodes.text: Cheunh was the main language spoken by the Chiss. The title of ozyly-esehembo was a Cheunh word for Force-sensitive Chiss navigators, which translated to Galactic Basic Standard as "sky-walker." Grand Admiral Thrawn, a Chiss, recounted his confusion when meeting Anakin Skywalker during the Clone Wars after he had asked Darth Vader to use the Force to navigate the Chimaera.
